summary: Client requested Jordan to run a test; QA confirmed the test passed with output matching 'howdi buddy'. PM, Architect, and Developer did not provide comments or blockers.

decisions.title: QA test acceptance
decisions.details: QA confirmed the tested output matches the expected value 'howdi buddy' and marked the test as passed.

sign_offs.what: Approved test output matches expected 'howdi buddy'

actions.task: Confirm test result in the issue tracker and mark the test task as complete (requested by client)

risks.risk: PM, Architect, and Developer provided no comments (not_addressed), which may indicate lack of visibility or undisclosed blockers.
risks.mitigation: Request explicit acknowledgement from PM/Architect/Developer and follow up asynchronously or in the next meeting to confirm there are no blockers.
